Nashville-Davidson.Longview (Nashville, Tennessee):
Longview is a historic mansion in Nashville, Tennessee, USA.


== Location ==
The mansion is located at 811 Caldwell lane in South Nashville, the county seat of Davidson County, Tennessee and capital of the state.


== History ==
A one-storey cottage was built in the Antebellum era for Henry Norvell and Laura Sevier, the granddaughter of John Sevier, who had served as the first Governor of Tennessee. During the Civil War, the house was used by Confederate General John Bell Hood in his preparation before the Battle of Nashville of December 15–16, 1864.
